title: PriceSmart: Fiscal 2Q Earnings Snapshot
maintext:
SAN DIEGO (AP) _ PriceSmart Inc. (PSMT) on Wednesday reported fiscal second-quarter net income of $25.6 million.
On a per-share basis, the San Diego-based company said it had profit of 85 cents.
The warehouse club operator posted revenue of $906.7 million in the period.
PriceSmart shares have decreased 18% since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Wednesday, shares hit $57.90, a decrease of roughly 4% in the last 12 months.
_____
